a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: World crude oil price vs. oil consumption
Global crude oil price, measured in US dollars per cubic meter, against total oil consumption, measured in average
cubic meters per day. Prices are adjusted for inflation.
Data source: Energy Institute Statistical Review of World Energy based on S&P Global Platts (2023)
Note: Prices are expressed in constant 2022 US$.
